mapper.insert: insert into bamboo (user_id, bamboo_title, bamboo_description, bamboo_image,bamboo_iframe,bamboo_header,bamboo_date, writer_nickname, is_used) values ( #{user_id}, #{bamboo_title}, #{bamboo_description}, #{bamboo_image} , #{bamboo_iframe}, #{bamboo_header}, now(), #{writer_nickname},1)
